results.title: Metformin alleviates the depression-like behaviors of elderly apoE4 mice via improving glucose metabolism and mitochondrial biogenesis.
results.text_hl: These findings imply that chronic @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment can improve apoE4-mediated @<m>DISEASE_Late_Onset_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000067562 @@@LOD@@@, providing mechanistic insights for apoE4- and age-based @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@ prevention and therapy.

citations.NLM: Lin Y, Dai X, Zhang J, Chen X. Metformin alleviates the depression-like behaviors of elderly apoE4 mice via improving glucose metabolism and mitochondrial biogenesis. Behav Brain Res. 2022 Apr 9;423():113772. PMID: 35090900

results.title: The Effect of Metformin and Metformin-Testosterone Combination on Cardiometabolic Risk Factors in Men with Late-onset Hypogonadism and Impaired Glucose Tolerance.
results.text_hl: The Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-@CHEMICAL_Testosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013739 @@@Testosterone@@@ Combination on Cardiometabolic Risk Factors in @SPECIES_9606 @@@Men@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Late_Onset_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000067562 @@@Late-onset Hypogonadism@@@ and @DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@Impaired Glucose Tolerance@@@.

citations.NLM: Krysiak R, Gilowski W, Okopien B. The Effect of Metformin and Metformin-Testosterone Combination on Cardiometabolic Risk Factors in Men with Late-onset Hypogonadism and Impaired Glucose Tolerance. Exp Clin Endocrinol Diabetes. 2015 Nov;123(10):608-13. PMID: 26600057

results.title: On the potential of metformin to prevent preterm delivery in women with polycystic ovary syndrome - an epi-analysis.
results.text_hl: The @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ had less @<m>DISEASE_Late_Onset_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000067562 @@@late@@@ @DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@miscarriage@@@/@DISEASE_Premature_Birth @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@preterm delivery@@@; five (3%) vs. 18 (11%) in the placebo group (p < 0.01).

citations.NLM: Vanky E, DE Zegher F, Díaz M, Ibáñez L, Carlsen SM. On the potential of metformin to prevent preterm delivery in women with polycystic ovary syndrome - an epi-analysis. Acta Obstet Gynecol Scand. 2012 Dec;91(12):1460-4. PMID: 23006146
citations.BibTeX: @article{23006146, title={On the potential of metformin to prevent preterm delivery in women with polycystic ovary syndrome - an epi-analysis.}, author={Vanky E and DE Zegher F and Díaz M and Ibáñez L and Carlsen SM}, journal={Acta Obstet Gynecol Scand}, volume={91}, number={12}, pages={1460-4}}
